html: Where “harm and injury” were wrought—among Jehovah’s people themselves and by their enemies—now only peace prevails. The parallel incidence of Jehovah’s “holy mountain” and “the earth” signifies that the nation or kingdom of his sanctified people ultimately spreads throughout the earth. The “knowledge” of Jehovah implies a personal knowledge that results from covenant keeping, not just a knowledge of his attributes. As the sea once epitomized the destructive power that was the archtyrant (v 15; Isaiah 5:30; 10:24-26; 51:15; 57:20), so in the millennial age its waters are subdued.
